DOC.detailed_description: NRX-1074 N-methyl-D-aspartate ( NMDA ) receptor functional partial agonist efficacy animal model affective disorder include major depressive disorder . The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety NRX-1074 dose level predict comparison human animal pharmacokinetics efficacious .
